entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
